metadata.title: BOOST High Protein Strawberries and Cream Overnight Oats

images.alt: BOOST High Protein Strawberries and Cream Overnight Oats

text: BOOST High Protein Strawberries and Cream Overnight Oats
Start your morning with ease when you prepare these tasty oats, packed with protein from the night before.
1 bottle (237 ml) BOOST High Protein Strawberry
1 cup (250 ml) plain low-fat Greek yogurt
Stir together oats, BOOSTÂ® High Protein Strawberry, milk, honey and salt.
Cover and refrigerate overnight. Divide evenly among 4 bowls.
For a lower sugar option, substitute with Boost Diabetic Strawberry (0.5g sugar vs 14g sugar in Boost High Protein)
Sprinkle with hemp and chia seeds if desired. Use vanilla yogurt if desired.
